event.title: was formed by a division of the original "Town of Mohawk" in 1793

data.event: The Town of Charleston was formed by a division of the original "Town of Mohawk" in 1793.
This division, which also created the Town of Florida, terminated Mohawk as a town until another town with that name (Mohawk) was created in 1837.
Charleston was reduced in size in 1823, when the Towns of Glen and Root (in part) were established.

event.title: was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1994

data.event: The First Baptist Church was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1994.
